pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Air Quality and Meteorological Information of Chile // Download air quality and meteorological information of Chile from the National Air Quality System (S.I.N.C.A.)https://sinca.mma.gob.cl/ dependent on the Ministry of the Environment and the Meteorological Directorate of Chile (D.M.C.)http://www.meteochile.gob.cl/ dependent on the Directorate General of Civil Aeronautics.
